publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2503 Patrick Harvie: Kathleen Marshall, Scotland’s First Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament offers its thanks to Professor Kathleen Marshall, Scotland’s first Commissioner for Children and Young People, for her outstanding service and commitment; understands but regrets her decision not to put herself forward for another term of office; believes that she will be a hard act to follow, and wishes her well for the future.

S3M-2503 Patrick Harvie: Kathleen Marshall, Scotland’s First Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament offers its thanks to Professor Kathleen Marshall, Scotland’s first Commissioner for Children and Young People, for her outstanding service and commitment; understands but regrets her decision not to put herself forward for another term of office; believes that she will be a hard act to follow, and wishes her well for the future.
